features: ONE WITH NATURE 100% PURE AND FEMININE BAR SOAP contains high concentrations of essential minerals that help balance skin PH and promote the growth of skin tissue, contributing to enhanced skin health. Discover the unparalleled benefits of embracing more with our premium feminine cleansing bar.

SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: One With Nature mineral feminine bar soap is suitable for all skin types for men and women. This soap bars hydrates, cleanses, and nourishes, leaving your skin soft and balanced. Infused with apple cider vinegar and super fat to protect, nourish, and moisturize while preserving the natural balance of the skin.

EXPERIENCE PURE INDULGENCE WITH THE ONE WITH NATURE FEMININE SOAP BAR Crafted without harsh fragrances or colorants, it's perfect for sensitive skin. Enriched with Probiotics and Oatmeal to soothe and calm, it's designed for all genders, providing a delightful, chemical-free shower experience. Nourish and Moisturize with our 3-pack feminine cleansing bar.

IDEAL GIFT FOR SKINCARE ENTHUSIASTS: Elevate gifting with One With Nature 3.5oz 3 pack fragrance-free feminine soap bar. Perfect for skincare lovers, it offers a luxurious and thoughtful present, combining effective beauty with a touch of indulgence. Unwrap the joy of radiant skin with our 3-pack feminine cleansing bar.

ONE WITH NATURE IS A FAMILY-OWNED and operated business committed to delivering top-notch skincare. We believe in using only the finest natural ingredients. If you're not completely satisfied with the quality of our product, let us know – We will take care of you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best feminine soap out there.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many washes and soaps over the years and this is THE only one that works for me. It lathers well and It keeps me fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A clean and Ph balance'd whoha is a fresh whoha!
reviews.reviewText: This soap is wonderful! It balances the ph level which control's odor without a perfumey smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice foam and light scent
reviews.reviewText: I wish they were a bit creamier and the scent was stronger. I have as gifts too but I haven’t had any feedback. Worth a try in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This soap was just what I needed. For a year I have been trying to figure out why my body odor had changed even went to doctor to make sure. All test were good. Started taking Probiotics supplements etc. I chalked it up as hormone change since I crossed over the 40 hump but I still didn't like it. I'm so hygiene self conscious.Anyways. I received my soap and used it the same day... wa~la... body orders gone. I was still skeptical thinking it would be temporary but 1 week in... and I'm VERY PLEASED with this product. It is the truth and I will be ordering more when I run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has a soft sent wish it was stronger,but it does leave your skin soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feminine wash bar for travel
reviews.reviewText: Bought this feminine wash bar for travel in place of liquid feminine wash. Cleanses well with minimal drying from the apple cider vinegar. Used oil to moisturize after bathing to avoid irritation and had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for the extra sensitive folks.
reviews.reviewText: I have used the unscented version of this soap for probably 3 years now. I love it and has never irritated my down there parts like regular soap bars.I can’t get the unscented where I am anymore so I ordered the floral scent. After two uses I am extremely irritated and will not continue use. Definitely not for the extra sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bar soap.
reviews.reviewText: No Oder no film . Makes me feel clean. Good suds.
